## Quality Checklist

Please confirm each item before submitting:

### Metadata
- [ ] Frontmatter is complete and valid (all required fields present).
- [ ] `source` URL and `license` are documented.
- [ ] `category` matches the taxonomy in `PRD.md`.

### Content
- [ ] All required sections are present (Description, Usage, Example, Skill Prompt).
- [ ] Financial disclaimer is included.
- [ ] No PII, secrets, or offensive content.

### Accuracy & Safety
- [ ] Skill does not present output as certified financial advice.
- [ ] Live data is expected from user, not hallucinated.
- [ ] Limitations are noted where relevant.

### Placement & Discovery
- [ ] File is in the correct `skills/<category>/<subcategory>/` folder.
- [ ] README index row has been added.

### Testing
- [ ] I have manually tested this skill with Claude and it produces correct, useful output.
